Message.MsgText: Failed to parse monitoring request {0}: RC={1}.

Explanation.p: The ${IMA_SVR_COMPONENT_NAME} has received an invalid monitoring request. The JSON request string is invalid.

OperatorResponse.p: Check server log entry for more information.

Message.MsgText: The monitoring action {0} is not supported.

Explanation.p: The requested monitoring action is not supported.

OperatorResponse.p: Check ${IMA_PRODUCTNAME_SHORT} documentation to determine if the requested option is valid.

Message.MsgText: The ${IMA_PRODUCTNAME_FULL} server is running server version is {0}{1}{2}

OperatorResponse.p: Use imaserver stat command to verify that there are no active connections.

Message.MsgText: No monitoring data is found for the specified command.

Explanation.p: No monitoring data is found for the specified command.

Message.MsgText: A NULL argument was passed to the {0} call.
The {0} property is NULL or empty.

Explanation.p: The value of the requested stat object is NULL or empty.

OperatorResponse.p: Ensure that the specified value is not NULL or empty.

Message.MsgText: The StatType is NULL or empty.

Explanation.p: The specified StatType is NULL or empty.

OperatorResponse.p: Ensure that the specified StatType is not NULL or empty.

Explanation.p: Invalid StatType is specified in the monitoring request.

OperatorResponse.p: Ensure that the specified StatType is valid.

Message.MsgText: Failed to get the {0} monitoring data.

Explanation.p: There is no monitoring data available for the requested monitoring object.
The specified endpoint is not found.

OperatorResponse.p: Use imaserver list Endpoint command to check if specified Endpoint is configured.

Message.MsgText: Failed to get monitoring data for the Endpoint {0}.

Explanation.p: A possible cause is that the Endpoint is not enabled.

OperatorResponse.p: Use imaserver show Endpoint command to check if Endpoint is enabled.

Message.MsgText: Failed to query the store statistics.

Explanation.p: There are two possible causes for this error. The ${IMA_SVR_COMPONENT_NAME} encountered an error during runtime. ${IMA_SVR_COMPONENT_NAME} is running is maintenance mode.

OperatorResponse.p: Use imaserver status command to check the ${IMA_SVR_COMPONENT_NAME} status.

Message.MsgText: Failed to query the memory statistics.

Explanation.p: There are two possible causes for this error. The ${IMA_SVR_COMPONENT_NAME} encountered an error during runtime. ${IMA_SVR_COMPONENT_NAME} is running is maintenance mode.

OperatorResponse.p: Use imaserver status command to check the ${IMA_SVR_COMPONENT_NAME} status.

Message.MsgText: The {0} historical statistics are not available.

Explanation.p: There are two possible causes for this error. The ${IMA_SVR_COMPONENT_NAME} encountered an error during runtime. ${IMA_SVR_COMPONENT_NAME} is running is maintenance mode.

OperatorResponse.p: Use imaserver status command to check the ${IMA_SVR_COMPONENT_NAME} status.

Message.MsgText: The ResultType is NULL or empty.

Explanation.p: The specified ResultType is NULL or empty.

OperatorResponse.p: Ensure that the specified ResultType is not NULL or empty.

Explanation.p: Invalid ResultType is specified in the monitoring request.

OperatorResponse.p: Ensure that the specified ResultType is valid.
